titles.title: MP664 The Spirit lives to set us free

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Spirit lives to set us free,
walk, walk in the light:
He binds us all in unity
walk, walk in the light;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus promised life to all,
walk, walk in the light;
the dead were wakened by His call,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He died in pain on Calvary,
walk, walk in the light;
to save the lost like you and me,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We know His death was not the end,
walk, walk in the light;
He gave His Spirit to be our friend,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
By Jesus' love our wounds are healed,
walk, walk in the light;
the Father's kindness is revealed,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
The Spirit lives in you and me,
walk, walk in the light;
His light will shine for all to see,
walk, walk in the light.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Walk in the light,
walk in the light,
walk in the light,
walk in the light of the Lord.
